text:
Hello!
Is it possible to export HubSpot user logs to Splunk automated in some way?
Although I’m not sure if the API provides you with access to user logs - I know you can export CMS logs

Hi guys! Someone that are using Clean 6 to help me with a question? In one of my pages using a Multi-Column content, I have a form, and my background is dark…trying to change the font color of the consent checkbox text, but is not working…any thoughts? Thanksss
Is this for a single page or for the global site
Is HubSpot planning any live (virtual or in-person) workshops/trainings for developers in the near future? We'd be very interested.
Any devs here also have some ColdFusion skills? If so, message me if you’d be up for a side project!

Hi - Is it possible to trigger a follow-up email when a user submits a form embedded on a non-HubSpot page?
I can’t see anything in the <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options|legacy form embed docs>
What happens to any website I create during the 14-day free trial of CMS Hub Professional after that period is over?
How far in advance can you pre provision SSL? Does the pre provisioning expire at some point?
*Marketing ↳Ads: Why do some Facebook customers fail to link to the Ad campaign?*
A customer clicks on a Facebook ad. The click is registered by Facebook.
When I push that info to Slack, it looks like this:
The name is missing, and the Original Source is not listed as Paid Social.
Any ideas? All other Facebook ads work fine.
